snippet.title: BROKENLORE: LOW | Official Trailer (Gameplay)
snippet.description:
BrokenLore: LOW, a first-person Horror Game, immerses players in the dark prelude of BrokenLore's story. Set in a mist-shrouded Japanese village, players uncover deep-seated hatred and ancient secrets. Navigate a hyperrealistic, claustrophobic environment where supernatural forces and tragic cycles abound.

Wishlist BrokenLore: LOW on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3014520/BrokenLore_LOW/

Follow us on Twitter
https://twitter.com/UNFOLLOW_GAME

and Instagram
https://www.instagram.com/serafiniproductions/
